name: Run Off
description:
A small first person 3D game made by Anagh's World for Trijam #152, GoedWare Game Jam #3, The Real Friendly Game Jam, Wasted Resources and Untitled Game Jam #59

[ My first 3D game using Godot and might be my last :P ]

Please Note: If you feel the game lags in the browser, then please download Windows playable version available at the end of the page. Linux & Mac users please use Wine to run the .exe file.

For better experience, play in FULLSCREEN and with HEADSETS.

Plot

Jack wants to be left alone and wants to start a new life. The only way he can achieve this is through the magical beans that will grow into a beanstalk, paving him a path to a new world.

Jams & Themes

  • Trijam #152 (Leave Me Alone)
    • The main character in the game ie. Jack needs to be left alone.
  • GoedWare Game Jam #3 (Enhance)
    • The player can collect lightning bolts along the way that enhances his speed by 2x.
  • The Real Friendly Game Jam (Collect Them All)
    • The player needs to collect all the magical beans to grow the beanstalk.
  • Wasted Resources (Don't Waste (y)our Energy)
    • The player's energy goes down as he walks/runs around. The more energy he wastes, the lesser chance he has to escape.
  • Untitled Game Jam #59 (New Start)
    • The main character in the game ie. Jack wants to start a new life.

Overview

"Run Off" is a first person 3D game where the main goal of the game is escape the current world. The game is about Jack who wants to be left alone and wants to start a new life, but he has very little energy left. Find all the magical beans and don't forget to collect the lightning bolts that will enhance his speed.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow Keys/Gamepad D-Pad to move
  • LMB/Gamepad Square to enable free look
  • Mouse for free look
  • Enter/Space/Gamepad Cross to start
  • R/Gamepad Start to restart
  • ESC/Gamepad Circle to quit
